summary: A Belgian business executive takes on his country's justice system after a procedural error that released his wife's murderer drives him to take matters into his own hands.
cast: Koen De Bouw|Johan Leysen|Veerle Baetens|Jappe Claes|Jo De Meyere|Chris Lomme|Hendrik Aerts|Viviane de Muynck|Wouter Hendrickx|Dirk Tuypens|Joke Devynck|Nell Cattrysse|Vic de Wachter|Sven De Ridder|Robbie Cleiren|Ella Leyers|Wietse Tanghe|Karel Deruwe|Camilia Blereau|Joris Van Dael|Ben Van Ostade|Erik Goris|Jos Verbist|Chiel Van Berkel|Michel Bauwens|Jo De Caluwé|Stef Wauters|Faroek Özgünes|Brice De Ruyver|Elke Pattyn|Freek Braeckman|Leo Stoops|Karl Apers|Etienne Vermeersch|Tom Naegels|Paul de Leeuw|Filip Van Hende|Erik Vandenbruaene|Werner De Nijs|Marilou Mermans|Patrick Pauwels|Ann Pira|Arnold Willems
title: El veredicto
